name: Fracture Fist
description:
This is a small little game I made in one week as a Self Imposed Game Jam. I made this as practice for the upcoming Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 that I am hoping to attend. For this game, I used the theme "Holes" from one of the previous Brackeys Game Jam. In this game, rocks are falling out of holes at you, you need to stop them by using your giant fist on a rope and SMASH THEM.

How to Play:

Click in the boxes of where you want the fist to go. (There should be a faint indicator on where hence boxes are)

SHIFT + S to go through menus and start game.

SHIFT + Q to exit the game.
